seg.quote: ...tourist attractions.

sense.def: A person who is attractive is pretty or handsome.
Kdor je attractive, je lep ali čeden.

seg.quote: ...a remarkably attractive girl.
...youthful attractiveness.

sense.def: Something that is attractive has a pleasant appearance or sound.
Kar je attractive, ima prijeten videz ali zvok.

seg.quote: ...attractive illustrations.

sense.def: You also say that something is attractive when it seems desirable.
Lahko tudi rečemo, da je nekaj attractive, kadar je videti zaželeno.

seg.quote: The company offers more time off and attractive pay.

sense.def: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation.
To attribute something to an event or situation pomeni, da mislimo, da je vzrok za tako stanje tisti dogodek ali položaj.

seg.quote: Economists attributed the lack of progress to poor cooperation.

sense.def: If you attribute a remark, a piece of writing, or a work of art to someone, you say that they said it, wrote it, or produced it.
To attribute a remark, a piece of writing, or a work to someone pomeni povedati, da je nekdo tisto pripombo, besedilo ali umetnino izrekel, napisal ali izdelal.
If you attribute a particular quality or feature to someone or something, you think they have it.
To attribute a particular quality or feature to someone or something pomeni misliti, da ima tisti človek ali stvar določeno lastnost ali značilnost.

seg.quote: Here we are attributing human feelings to animals.
...the attribution of mysterious powers to these men.

sense.def: An attribute is a quality or feature.
An attribute je značilnost ali oznaka.

seg.quote: ...her physical attributes.

sense.def: If you are attuned to something, you can understand and appreciate it.
Kadar je človek attuned to something, se na nekaj spozna in tisto ceni.

seg.quote: The public is not quite attuned to this kind of art.

sense.def: If your ears are attuned to a sound, you can hear it and recognize it quickly.
Če so človekova ušesa attuned to a sound, tisti zvok slišijo in hitro prepoznajo.
An aubergine is a vegetable with a smooth purple skin.
An aubergine je vrsta zelenjave z gladko, vijoličasto lupino.
Auburn hair is reddish brown.
Lasje, ki so auburn, so rdečkasto rjavi.
An auction is a public sale where goods are sold to the person who offers the highest price.
An auction je javna prodaja predmetov osebam, ki ponudijo najvišjo ceno.

seg.quote: The big house was sold by auction.

sense.def: If you auction something, you sell it in an auction.
To auction something pomeni nekaj prodati na dražbi.

cit.quote: licitirati, ponuditi v prodajo na dražbi

seg.quote: They are going to auction the pictures at the end of the month.

sense.def: If you auction off a number of things, you get rid of them all by selling them at an auction.
To auction off a number of things pomeni, da se vrste predmetov znebimo s prodajo na dražbi.
An auctioneer is a person in charge of an auction.
An auctioneer je oseba, ki vodi dražbo.
Audacious behaviour is bold or cheeky.
Vedênje, ki je audacious, je predrzno ali nespoštljivo.

seg.quote: ...a series of audacious adventures.
He had the audacity to blame Baldwin for their failure.

sense.def: An audible sound can be heard.
Zvok, ki je audible, je mogoče slišati.

seg.quote: The clock ticked audibly.

sense.def: The audience is all the people who are watching or listening to something such as a play, concert, film, or television programme.
The audience so vsi ljudje, ki gledajo ali poslušajo kakšno predstavo, na primer dramo, koncert, film ali televizijsko oddajo.
You can also use audience to refer to the people who read someone's books or hear about their ideas.
Z besedo audience lahko opišemo tudi ljudi, ki berejo knjige ali poslušajo zamisli kakšnega človeka.

seg.quote: ...the need for intellectuals to communicate their ideas to a wider audience.

sense.def: If you have an audience with someone important, you have a formal meeting with them.
To have an audience with someone important pomeni imeti uraden sestanek s pomembno osebo.
Audio equipment is used for recording and reproducing sound.
Oprema, ki je audio, se uporablja za snemanje in predvajanje zvoka.
Audio-visual teaching aids involve both recorded sound and pictures.
Učni pripomočki, ki so audio-visual, uporabljajo zvok in sliko.
When an accountant audits an organization's accounts, he or she examines them officially to make sure that they are correct.
Kadar revizor audits an organization's accounts, uradno pregleda račune nekega podjetja, da se prepriča o njihovi pravilnosti.

seg.quote: We're going to conduct a full audit.

sense.def: An audition is a short performance that someone gives so that a director can decide if they are good enough to be in a play, film, or orchestra.
An audition je kratek nastop, po katerem se vodja odloči, ali je nastopajoči dovolj dober za sodelovanje v drami, filmu ali orkestru.
If you audition or if someone auditions you, you perform an audition.
Kadar človek auditions ali kadar nekdo drug auditions someone, tisti človek nastopi na avdiciji.

cit.quote: udeležiti se avdicije; preizkusiti na avdiciji

sense.def: An auditor is an accountant who officially examines the accounts of organizations.
An auditor je računovodja, ki uradno pregleda račune nekega podjetja.
In a theatre or concert hall, the auditorium is the part of the building where the audience sits.
The auditorium je tisti del gledališča ali koncertne dvorane, kjer sedi občinstvo.
To augment something means to make it larger by adding something to it;
To augment something pomeni, da z dodajanjem nekaj naredimo večje;

seg.quote: They hit upon another idea to augment their income.

sense.def: August is the eighth month of the year in the Western calendar.
August je osmi mesec v letu.
Your aunt is the sister of your mother or father, or the wife of your uncle.
An aunt je materina ali očetova sestra ali stričeva žena.

seg.quote: ...Aunt Alice.

sense.def: An au pair is a young foreign woman who lives for a time with a family in order to learn the language and to help with the children and housework.
An au pair je mlada tujka, največkrat študentka, ki nekaj časa živi pri družini, da bi se naučila jezika, in v zameno pomaga pri otrocih in hišnih opravilih.
An aura is a quality or feeling that seems to surround a person or place.
An aura je lastnost ali občutek, za katerega se zdi, da obkroža neko osebo ali kraj.

seg.quote: ...an aura of glamour and prestige.

sense.def: Something that is austere is plain and not decorated.
Kar je austere, je preprosto in neokrašeno.

seg.quote: The interior of the church is sober and austere.
...the austerity of these surroundings.

sense.def: An austere person is strict and serious.
Kdor je austere, je mračen in resnoben.
An austere way of life is simple and has no luxuries.
Način življenja, ki je austere, je preprost in brez razkošja.
Australian means belonging or relating to Australia.
Australian je tak, ki pripada Avstraliji ali je povezan z njo.
An Australian is a person who comes from Australia.
An Australian je oseba, ki je po rodu iz Avstralije.
If a letter or painting is authentic, it is genuine rather than a forgery or an imitation.
Slika ali pismo, ki je authentic, je pristen in ne ponaredek ali posnetek.

seg.quote: He challenged the authenticity of the letter.

sense.def: If information or an account is authentic, it is reliable and accurate.
Podatek ali račun, ki je authentic, je zanesljiv in natančen.

seg.quote: ...an authentic account of the war.
No historian has ever doubted the authenticity of Haldane's account.

sense.def: If you authenticate something, you establish that it is genuine after examining it.
To authenticate something pomeni, da tisto pregledamo in ugotovimo, ali je pristno.

seg.quote: These stories seem to be well authenticated.

sense.def: The author of a piece of writing is the person who wrote it.
The author of a piece of writing je oseba, ki je nekaj napisala.
An author is a person whose occupation is writing books.
An author je človek, ki se poklicno ukvarja s pisanjem knjig.
Someone who is authoritarian wants to control other people rather than letting them decide things themselves;
Kdor je authoritarian, želi ukazovati drugim, namesto da bi jim dovolil, da odločajo sami;

seg.quote: The old rulers were authoritarians.

sense.def: If someone behaves in an authoritative way, they give an impression of power and importance.
Kadar človek behaves in an authoritative way, daje vtis velike moči in pomembnosti.

seg.quote: ...an authoritative display of discipline.
"Don't do that," he said authoritatively.

sense.def: An authoritative piece of writing is based on a lot of knowledge or facts.
Zapis, ki je authoritative, sloni na veliko znanja ali številnih dejstvih.

seg.quote: ...his authoritative study of the Commonwealth.

sense.def: An authority is an official organization or government department that has the power to make decisions.
An authority je uradna organizacija ali vladna služba, ki ima pravico do odločanja.

seg.quote: She sold the house to the local authority.
The authorities have got to clamp down on people like this.

sense.def: If you have authority over someone, you have the power to control them.
To have authority over someone pomeni, da imamo moč, da tistemu človeku ukazujemo.

seg.quote: He made efforts to reassert his authority over them.
He would be reported to those in authority.

sense.def: Authority is official permission to do something.
Authority je uradno dovoljenje za neko dejanje.

seg.quote: Have you been ordering taxis without signed authority?

sense.def: Someone who is an authority on a subject knows a lot about it.
Človek, ki je an authority on a subject, o neki stvari veliko ve.

seg.quote: He is an authority on India.

sense.def: If someone in authority authorizes something, they give their official permission for it to happen.
Kadar človek na visokem položaju authorizes something, da za tisto svoje uradno dovoljenje.

seg.quote: The president authorized the bombings.
They will have to phone your branch for authorization.

sense.def: In North America, cars are sometimes called autos.
Auto je v Severni Ameriki včasih poimenovanje za avtomobil.
A piece of writing that is autobiographical relates to events in the life of the person who has written it.
Zapis, ki je autobiographical, pripoveduje o dogodkih v življenju osebe, ki ga je napisala.
Your autobiography is an account of your life, which you write yourself.
One's autobiography je pripoved o našem lastnem življenju, ki jo napišemo sami.
Someone who is autocratic has complete power and makes decisions without asking anyone else's advice.
Kdor je autocratic, ima popolno oblast in odloča, ne da bi koga prosil za nasvet.
If you ask someone famous for their autograph, you ask them to write their signature for you.
Kadar slavno osebo prosimo za njen autograph, jo prosimo, da se nam podpiše.
When a famous person autographs something, they put their signature on it.
Kadar slavna oseba autographs something, na nekaj napiše svoje ime.

seg.quote: He gave me an autographed copy of his book.

sense.def: To automate a factory, office, or industrial process means to install machines which can do the work instead of people.
To automate a factory, office, or industrial process pomeni, da montiramo stroje, ki bodo opravljali delo namesto ljudi v neki tovarni, pisarni ali pri industrijskem postopku.

seg.quote: This is an age of high technology and automation.

sense.def: An automatic machine does not need anyone to operate it.
Za upravljanje stroja, ki je automatic, človek ni potreben.

seg.quote: ...automatic washing machines.
The lights come on automatically.

sense.def: An automatic gun, car, or washing machine can be called an automatic.
An automatic je lahko poimenovanje za, na primer, avtomatsko puško, avtomobil ali pralni stroj.
An automatic action is one that you do without thinking about it.
Dejanje, ki je automatic, opravimo brez razmišljanja.

seg.quote: Most of our decisions are automatic.
Billy found himself automatically walking up to the house.

sense.def: If something such as an action or a punishment is automatic, it happens as the normal result of something else.
Kadar je dejanje ali kazen automatic, je običajna posledica nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: These offences carry automatic fines.
Once people retire they automatically cease to be union members.

sense.def: In North America, cars are sometimes called automobiles.
An automobile je v Severni Ameriki včasih poimenovanje za avtomobil.
An autonomous country, organization, or group governs or controls itself rather than being controlled by anyone else.
Država, organizacija ali skupina, ki je autonomous, ima svoje lastno upravljanje in ne zunanji nadzor.
Autonomy is the control of a country, organization, or group by itself, rather than by others.
Autonomy je nadzor nad državo, organizacijo ali skupino, ki ga ta izvaja sama, brez drugih.

seg.quote: They wanted more autonomy.

sense.def: An autopsy is an examination of a dead body by a doctor who cuts it open in order to try to discover the cause of death.
An autopsy je preiskava trupla, ki ga zdravnik razreže in poskusi ugotoviti vzrok smrti.
Autumn is the season between summer and winter. In the autumn the weather becomes cooler.
Autumn je letni čas med poletjem in zimo, ko se vreme ohladi.

seg.quote: The rain began in the late autumn.
...autumn leaves.

sense.def: Something that is autumnal has features that are characteristic of autumn.
Kar je autumnal, ima lastnosti, značilne za jesen.
An auxiliary is a person who is employed to help other people. Auxiliaries are often medical workers or members of the armed forces.
An auxiliary je oseba, ki po službeni dolžnosti pomaga drugim. Auxiliaries so pogosto medicinski delavci ali člani oboroženih sil.

seg.quote: ...nursing auxiliaries.
...six auxiliary squadrons.

sense.def: Auxiliary equipment is extra equipment that is used when necessary.
Oprema, ki je auxiliary, je pomožna in jo uporabljamo po potrebi.

seg.quote: ...auxiliary scaffolding.

sense.def: In grammar, the auxiliary verbs are žbe", žhave", and ždo". They are used with a main verb to form tenses, negatives, questions, and so on.
V slovnici so auxiliary verbs be, have in do. Uporabljamo jih skupaj z glavnim glagolom pri oblikovanju časov, nikalnih in vprašalnih stavkov in tako dalje.
If an action is of no avail or is done to no avail, it does not achieve what you want.
Če rečemo, da je neko dejanje of no avail, ali da je bilo storjeno to no avail, z njim ne dosežemo tistega, kar želimo.

seg.quote: Speeches and protests were of no avail.
They were fighting to no avail.

sense.def: If something is available, you can use it or obtain it.
Kadar je nekaj available, tisto lahko uporabimo ali dobimo.

seg.quote: ...the amount of money available for spending.
...the availability of oil.

sense.def: Someone who is available is not busy and is therefore free to talk to you or spend time with you.
Kdor je available, nima dela in ima zato čas, da se z nami pogovarja ali preživlja čas z nami.
An avalanche is a large mass of snow or rock that falls down the side of a mountain.
An avalanche je velika gmota snega ali kamenja, ki zdrsne po gorskem pobočju.
You can refer to a large quantity of things that arrive or happen at the same time as an avalanche of them.
An avalanche of something je velika količina nečesa, kar pride ali se zgodi ob istem času.

seg.quote: ...an avalanche of tourists.

sense.def: Avant-garde art, theatre, and writing is modern and experimental.
Umetnost, gledališče in pisanje, ki je avant-garde, je sodobno in eksperimentalno.
Avarice is extreme greed for money.
Avarice je izjemen pohlep po denarju.
Someone who is avaricious is very greedy for money.
Kdor je avaricious, je zelo lakomen na denar.
If you avenge a wrong or harmful act, you hurt or punish the person who did it.
To avenge a wrong or harmful act pomeni, da ranimo ali kaznujemo človeka, ki je storil napačno ali škodljivo dejanje.

seg.quote: He was determined to avenge his father's death.

sense.def: An avenue is a wide road with trees on either side.
An avenue je široka cesta, obdana z drevesi.
An avenue is also a way of getting something done.
An avenue je tudi način, kako kaj opravimo.

seg.quote: We are exploring a number of avenues.

sense.def: An average is the result you get when you add several amounts together and divide the total by the number of amounts.
An average je izid, ki ga dobimo, kadar seštejemo več zneskov in seštevek delimo s številom zneskov.

seg.quote: These pupils were examined in 39 subjects, an average of 6.5 subjects for each pupil.
The average age of the group was thirty-nine years.

sense.def: To average a particular amount means to be that amount as an average over a period of time.
To average a particular amount pomeni, da tista količina velja kot povprečje v določenem času.

seg.quote: Price increases during these years averaged around 20%.

sense.def: Average is sometimes used to mean normal in size or quality.
Kar je average, je značilno za normalno velikost ali kakovost.

seg.quote: ...a sheet of paper of average thickness.
Their language development is below average.

sense.def: You say on average to indicate that a number is the average of several numbers.
Kadar rečemo on average, hočemo povedati, da je določeno število povprečje več števil.

seg.quote: We can discover how many words, on average, a person reads in a minute.

sense.def: When you average out a set of numbers, you work out the average.
Kadar človek averages out a set of numbers, izračuna povprečje vrste števil.
If you say that you are not averse to something, you mean that you quite like it or quite want to do it;
Kadar človek ni averse to something, mu je tisto všeč ali bi tisto rad počel;
If you have an aversion to someone or something, you dislike them very much.
To have an aversion to someone or something pomeni, da tistega človeka ali predmeta ne maramo.

seg.quote: She had a great aversion to children.

sense.def: Your aversion is something that you strongly dislike.
One's aversion je tisto, česar človek nikakor ne mara.

seg.quote: His current aversion is pop music.

sense.def: To avert something unpleasant means to prevent it from happening.
To avert something unpleasant pomeni, da onemogočimo kak neprijeten dogodek.

seg.quote: There must be immediate action if total chaos is to be averted.

sense.def: If you avert your eyes from something, you look away from it.
To avert one's eyes from something pomeni ozreti se proč.
An aviary is a large cage or covered area in which birds are kept.
An aviary je velika kletka ali pokrit prostor; v njem imamo ptice.
Aviation is the operation and production of aircraft.
Aviation je izdelovanje letal in upravljanje z njimi.
You use avid to describe someone who is very keen and enthusiastic about something.
Z besedo avid opišemo človeka, ki je za nekaj zelo vnet in navdušen.

seg.quote: ...an avid reader of movie magazines.
They listened avidly.

sense.def: Someone who is avid for something is eager to get it.
Kdor je avid for something, bi tisto zelo rad dobil.
An avocado or avocado pear is a tropical fruit in the shape of a pear with a dark green skin and a large stone inside it.
An avocado ali an avocado pear je tropski sadež hruškaste oblike z grobo temno zeleno kožo in veliko koščico v sredini.
If you avoid something that might happen, you take action in order to prevent it from happening.
To avoid something pomeni ukrepati, da bi preprečili nekaj, kar bi se lahko zgodilo.

seg.quote: ...a book on how to avoid a heart attack.

sense.def: If you avoid doing something, you make a deliberate effort not to do it.
To avoid doing something pomeni, da se namenoma potrudimo, da tistega ne bi storili.

seg.quote: Thomas turned his head, trying to avoid breathing in the smoke.

sense.def: If you avoid someone or something, you keep away from them.
To avoid someone or something pomeni, da tistemu človeku ali stvari ne hodimo blizu.
Avoidance of someone or something is the act of avoiding them.
Avoidance of someone or something je izogibanje nekomu ali nečemu.

seg.quote: ...the avoidance of responsibilities.

sense.def: An avowal of something is an admission or declaration of it;
An avowal of something je priznanje ali izjava nečesa;

seg.quote: He made a shy avowal of love.

sense.def: If you are an avowed supporter or opponent of something, you have declared that you support it or oppose it;
Človek, ki je an avowed supporter or opponent of something, izjavi, da tisto zagovarja ali zavrača;

seg.quote: ...avowed enemies.

sense.def: An avowed belief or aim is one that you hold very strongly.
Za prepričanje ali cilj, ki je avowed, se zelo odločno zavzemamo.
If you await someone or something, you wait for them.
To await someone or something pomeni, da nekoga ali nekaj čakamo.

seg.quote: I returned to the States to find the FBI awaiting me.

sense.def: Something that awaits you is going to happen to you in the future.
Kadar nekaj awaits someone, se bo človeku tisto v prihodnosti zgodilo.

seg.quote: ...the adventures that awaited him.

sense.def: Someone who is awake is not sleeping.
Kdor je awake, ne spi.

seg.quote: He lay awake all night.

sense.def: When you awake or when something awakes you, you wake up;
Kadar človek awakes ali kadar nekaj awakes someone, se tisti človek zbudi;

seg.quote: I awoke from a deep sleep.

sense.def: To awaken a feeling in a person means to cause them to have this feeling.
To awaken a feeling in a person pomeni, da pri tistem človeku povzročimo določeno čustvo.

seg.quote: My first visit to a theatre awakened an interest which never left me.

sense.def: When you awaken to a fact or when someone awakens you to it, you become aware of it.
Kadar človek awakens to a fact ali kadar človek awakens someone to a fact pomeni, da se človek nekega dejstva zave ali pa povzroči, da se ga zave nekdo drug.

seg.quote: Gradually people are awakening to their responsibilities.

sense.def: When you awaken or when something awakens you, you wake up.
Kadar človek awakens ali če something awakens somebody, se človek zbudi.
The awakening of a feeling or realization in someone is the start of it.
The awakening of a feeling or realization je nastanek nekega občutka ali spoznanja v človeku.
If you have a rude awakening, you are suddenly made aware of an unpleasant fact.
To have a rude awakening pomeni, da se nenadoma zavemo neprijetnega dejstva.

cit.quote: pristati na trdih tleh, prebuditi se

sense.def: An award is a prize or certificate that a person is given for doing something well.
An award je potrdilo ali dokazilo, da neka oseba nekaj dobro dela.
An award is also a sum of money that a court of law decides should be given to someone as compensation.
An award je tudi znesek, ki ga nekomu določi sodišče kot nadomestilo.
To award something to someone means to give it to them as a prize, reward, or compensation.
To award something to someone pomeni, da tisto nekomu podelimo kot nagrado, priznanje ali odškodnino.
If you are aware of a fact or situation, you know about it.
Kadar je človek aware of a fact or situation, ve za tisto dejstvo ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: He was aware that he had drunk too much whisky.
I was quite aware of this before we married.
...the public awareness of the need for conservation.

sense.def: If you are aware of something that is present or happening, you know that it is present or happening because you can hear it, see it, smell it, or feel it.
Kadar je človek aware of something, ve za nekaj, kar je navzoče ali se dogaja, ker tisto sliši, vidi, voha ali čuti.

seg.quote: Ralph was aware of the heat for the first time.

sense.def: If you say that someone is aware, you mean that they notice what is happening around them.
Kdor je aware, opazi, kaj se dogaja okoli njega.

seg.quote: Some people are more politically aware.

sense.def: If you move away from a place, you move so that you are no longer there.
To move away from a place pomeni premakniti se tako, da nismo več na tistem kraju.

seg.quote: He rose and walked away.

sense.def: If you look or turn away from something, you move your head so that you are no longer looking at it.
To look or turn away from something pomeni premakniti glavo tako, da tistega ne gledamo več.
Away from a person or place means at a distance from that person or place.
Away from a person or place pomeni v določeni razdalji od neke osebe ali kraja.

seg.quote: ...a pleasant picnic spot away from the city.

sense.def: If you put something away, you put it in a safe place.
To put something away pomeni dati tisto na varno.

seg.quote: Tom put the book away.
The report is not yet ready to be filed away.

sense.def: If someone is away, they are not in the place where people expect them to be.
Kadar je človek away, ga ni tam, kjer ga ljudje pričakujejo.

seg.quote: Is he at home or has he gone away?

sense.def: You also use away to talk about future events. For example, if an event is a week away, it will happen in a week.
Besedo away uporabljamo tudi v pogovoru o prihodnjih dogodkih. Na primer: kadar je neki dogodek a week away, se bo zgodil čez teden dni.
If you give something away or if someone takes it away from you, you no longer have it.
To give something away ali to take something away from someone pomeni, da človek tistega nima več.
When a sports team plays an away game, it plays on its opponents' ground.
Kadar športno moštvo igra tekmo, ki je away, igra na nasprotnikovem igrišču.
You can use away to say that something slowly disappears, or changes so that it is no longer the same.
Z besedo away lahko povemo, da nekaj počasi izginja ali se spreminja, tako da ni več enako kot prej.

seg.quote: The snow had all melted away.

sense.def: Away is also used to emphasize that an action is continuous or repeated.
Besedo away uporabimo, kadar želimo poudariti, da se neko dejanje nadaljuje ali ponavlja.

seg.quote: Howard was still working away in the university library.
She was coughing away.

sense.def: Awe is the respect and amazement that you feel when you are faced with something wonderful and rather frightening.
Awe je spoštovanje in osuplost, ki ju občutimo, kadar se soočimo z nečim čudovitim ali strašnim.

seg.quote: The child stared at him in silent awe.

sense.def: If you are in awe of someone, you have a lot of respect for them and are slightly afraid of them.
Kadar je človek in awe of someone, tistega človeka močno spoštuje in se ga malce boji.
If you are awed by someone or something, you are impressed by them and rather frightened of them.
To be awed by someone or something pomeni, da smo zaradi tistega osupli in precej preplašeni.

seg.quote: ...talking in an awed whisper.

sense.def: Something that is awe-inspiring is amazing and rather frightening.
Kar je awe-inspiring, je presenetljivo in precej strašno.
Something that is awesome is very impressive and frightening.
Kar je awesome, je osupljivo in strašno.

seg.quote: ...an awesome weapon.

sense.def: If you say that something is awful, you mean that it is very unpleasant or bad.
Kar je awful, je zelo neprijetno ali slabo.

seg.quote: Isn't the weather awful?
...that awful war.

sense.def: If you look or feel awful, you look or feel ill.
To look or feel awful pomeni, da smo videti ali se počutimo bolni.
You can use awful to emphasize how large an amount is;
Z besedo awful lahko poudarimo, kako velika je neka količina;

seg.quote: It must have taken an awful lot of courage.

sense.def: You use awfully to emphasize how much of a quality someone or something has;
Z besedo awfully poudarimo, koliko neke lastnosti ima nekdo ali nekaj;

seg.quote: She was awfully nice.
I'm awfully sorry.

sense.def: Awhile means for a short time;
Awhile pomeni malo časa;

seg.quote: Can't you just wait awhile?

sense.def: An awkward movement or position is uncomfortable or clumsy.
Lega ali gib, ki je awkward, je neudoben ali neroden.

seg.quote: ...an awkward gesture.
He fell and lay awkwardly, covered in mud.

sense.def: Someone who is awkward behaves in a shy or embarrassed way.
Kdor je awkward, se vede plašno in je v zadregi.

seg.quote: I hated the big formal dances and felt very awkward.
I said, "How do you do?" awkwardly.
There was no awkwardness between them.

sense.def: You also say that someone is awkward when they are unreasonable and difficult to live with or deal with.
Z besedo awkward lahko tudi opišemo človeka, kadar je nerazumen in je z njim težko živeti ali ravnati.
An awkward job is difficult to do.
Naloga, ki je awkward, je težavna.

seg.quote: Getting the wheel off can be awkward.

sense.def: An awkward situation is embarrassing and difficult to deal with.
V položaju, ki je awkward, nam je mučno in težko.

seg.quote: McPherson started making things awkward for him.
He asked a lot of awkward questions.

sense.def: An awning is a piece of material attached to a caravan or building which provides shelter from the rain or sun.
An awning je kos blaga, pritrjen na prikolico ali stavbo kot varovalo pred dežjem ali soncem.
Awoke is the past tense of awake.
Awoke je preteklik glagola to awake.
Awoken is the past participle of awake.
Awoken je pretekli deležnik glagola to awake.
If something is awry, it is not in its normal or proper position.
Kadar je nekaj awry, ni v svojem običajnem ali pravilnem položaju.

seg.quote: His tie was awry.

sense.def: If something goes awry, it does not happen in the way it was planned and it goes wrong.
Kadar nekaj goes awry, se ne zgodi tako, kot je bilo v načrtu, ampak se ponesreči.
An axe is a tool used for cutting wood. It consists of a blade attached to the end of a long handle.
An axe je orodje za sekanje lesa, sestavljeno iz rezila in dolgega držala, na katerega je rezilo nasajeno.
If the government or a company axes a project or plan, it suddenly ends it.
Če vlada ali podjetje axes a project or plan, neki projekt ali načrt nenadoma prekine.
An axiom is a statement or idea which people accept as being true;
An axiom je izjava ali ideja, ki jo ljudje sprejmejo za resnično;
An axis is an imaginary line through the middle of something.
An axis je umišljena črta, ki teče skozi sredino nečesa.

seg.quote: The earth's axis is tilted at an angle of about 23°.

sense.def: An axis of a graph is one of the two lines on which the scales of measurement are marked.
An axis of a graph je ena od obeh črt na zemljevidu ali grafikonu, na kateri so označene mere ali merske enote.
An axle is a rod connecting a pair of wheels on a car or other vehicle.
An axle je drog, ki povezuje po dve kolesi avtomobila ali kakšnega drugega vozila.
In some British dialects, aye means yes.
V nekaterih britanskih narečjih aye pomeni da.
Azure means bright blue.
Azure pomeni svetlo moder.
